hypertools.tools.cluster¶

hypertools.tools.cluster(x, n_clusters=8, ndims=None)[source]¶

Performs k-means clustering and returns a list of cluster labels

Parameters:
x : A Numpy array, Pandas Dataframe or list of numpy arrays/dfs

The data to be clustered. You can pass a single array/df or a list. If a list is passed, the arrays will be stacked and the clustering will be performed across all lists (i.e. not within each list).

n_clusters : int The number of clusters to discover (i.e. k)

ndims : int or None
This parameter allows you to first reduce dimensionality before running k-means
Returns:
cluster_labels : list
An list of cluster labels
